subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: It took nearly 24 hours but Rafael Nadal finally learned which unlikely, stubble-faced veteran he will be facing in the Wimbledon semifinal: Rainer Schuettler of Germany.
snippet: It took nearly 24 hours but Rafael Nadal finally learned which unlikely, stubble-faced veteran he will be facing in the Wimbledon semifinal: Rainer Schuettler of Germany.
